author: g11tech
content: after due thought and going over the implemented access lists: my proposed construction: `access_list = Set[Address, List[AccessedStorageSlots] ,Set[AccessedInBlockTransactionNumber,List[AccessedStorageSlots] ] ]`. this could easily be exxtended to include witness data/proofs: `access_list=Set[Address,List[AccessedStorageSlots],List[AccessedWitnesses],Set[AccessedInBlockTransactionNumber,List[AccessedStorageSlots],List[AccessedWitness] ] ]`. There is some data denormalization here for the purposes of enabling client optimizations. For purposes of building `canonical access document` whose commitment/hash can be included in block header: `Set<SortedByAddress>[Address, List<Sorted>[AccessedStorageSlots],Set<SortedByTransactionNumber>[AccessedInBlockTransactionNumber,List<Sorted>[AccessedStorageSlots] ] ]` this can easily be constructed  from the transaction access_list that have been already generated(on miner side) , and furthermore, those transaction access list can be easily reconstructed from the above construction (on client side). above construction can also be used to construct a partial order (full accessed by order is not needed) on the transactions (DFS) enabling (optional and client dependent) parallel transaction computation/optimizations/sharding, and an easy index on to the transactions in the block affecting the current address (for light clients) as well as witness bundling in future. a merkel/verkel trie can be build for hashes/commitments with chunkified addresses in the leaf and the root embedded in the blockheader for "integrity" checks. if trie computation is too heavy, a simple hash/commitment can be used, but for distributed downloading of the access list especially when witness data is there. also an access_list_root type be included in the header to specify the hash derivation technique (which can evolve/extended over time)

author: g11tech
content: another advantage of having sorted list data is, potential compression can be applied <<on a network protocol level like beam sync>> while data transmitting time on network, by transmitting diffs rather than full addresses (can be done on all the lists like transactions #s, slots) in a chunk. denormed data can be constructed on reception and integrity checked
